text: @RahulGandhi We need to abort all videshi saman ur party is a videshi Our honourable PM MODI said aatmanirbhar ur party need to be thrown out as it is creation of British . I feel sad for u how u r left with such small brain . DO U KNOW COVID19 and talking about economy how stupid can one b.
